GetMaxBits() GetMaxBitsPhoton.Compression.Internal.SyncVarBaseAttribute Photon.Compression.Internal.SyncVarBaseAttributeGetMaxBits
virtual int Photon.Compression.Internal.SyncVarBaseAttribute.GetMaxBits (Type fieldType)[virtual]
Maximum possible bits that can be used during bitpacking.
These are used to determine the byte[] size for any PackObjects. Override this if the PackableAttribute will always use less than these values. Doing so will result in some memory savings.

snapshotCallback snapshotCallbackPhoton.Compression.Internal.SyncVarBaseAttribute Photon.Compression.Internal.SyncVarBaseAttributesnapshotCallback
string Photon.Compression.Internal.SyncVarBaseAttribute.snapshotCallback
Called every net tick before SyncObjects.OnSnapshot and before PackObjs.applyCallback is run.
Use this if you intend to handle your own interpolation/tween operations. Snap value is not be applied to the syncvar yet.

SyncAs Photon.Compression.Internal.SyncVarBaseAttribute.syncAs = SyncAs.Auto
Indicates how the Pack syncvar should be treated.
'State' maintains the value until changed. 'Trigger' resets the value to new() after capture/send.
